title: Poster, "Images of an Era The American Poster 1945-1975, Exhibition Poster for The Grey Art Gallery, and Study Center, New York University", 1975
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in red center right : Ivan Chermayeff
inscribed: Imprinted in black below image: Grey Art Gallery & Study Center, New York University / Washington Square East / May 25 - July 8 / Organized by the National Collection of Fine Arts, / Smithsonian Institution / Made possible by a grant from Mobil
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Red and white squares that contain, and are also formed by, the letters that make up the exhibition title are shown against a blue background.   Below in black, the name and address of the Gallery, dates and sponsors.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Images of an Era The American Poster 1945-1975, Exhibition Poster for The Grey Art Gallery, and Study Center, New York University", 1975.
1975. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-211.
